Package com.mystic_alchemy.ics2java.calendar

Class Calendar

java.lang.Object
com.mystic_alchemy.ics2java.calendar.Calendar
public class Calendar extends Object
Represents an iCal calendar with its events. Doesn't handle weekdays on its own.
Since:
0.1
Version:
0.4
Author:
PilleniusMC for Mystic-Alchemy

  • Method Details

    • getEvents

      Gets all events of this calendar
      Returns:
      the events of this calendar

    • setEvents

      Sets the events for this calendar

    • addEvent

      Adds an event to this calendar
      Parameters:

    • getEventsForDate

      public Event[] getEventsForDate​(LocalDate date)
      Gets events for a given date.
      Parameters:
      date - the date for which Events should be gotten
      Returns:
      an array of events, happening on the passed date

    • getFirstEventForDate

      public Event getFirstEventForDate​(LocalDate date)
      Gets the first event of a given date.

      The first event for a given day is equal to calling getEventsForDate(date)[0]

      WARNING: May cause issues, as it returns the oldest entered event for a given date.

      Parameters:
      date - the date for which Events should be gotten
      Returns:
      the first event of a date

    • getLastEventForDate

      public Event getLastEventForDate​(LocalDate date)
      Gets the last event of a given date.

      WARNING: Only returns the newest event.

      Parameters:
      date - the date for which Events should be gotten
      Returns:
      the last event of a date
